snippet.title: ARBO: Arena Tactics - Game Overview
snippet.description:
Join our Alpha Playtest

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2914810/ARBO_Arena_Tactics/

Get your Playtest Steam key: https://community.arbo.xyz/

ABOUT THE GAME
In ARBO: Arena Tactics, you will command squads of intergalactic fighters in fast-paced, turn-based combat within an interactive hex-tiled arena. We've blended our favorite strategy games to create this strategy-CCG hybrid, designed to challenge your tactical thinking and reward creative playstyles. Try your hand at theorycrafting and engaging in epic battles of wits with your opponents.

#gaming #strategygames #indiegame #turnbased #videogames #tactics #tacticsgame 

Join the conversation: https://discord.gg/ARBO
